resources.string: Bears that are native to China, where they are consider national treasure.
Gorillas fit into the category of primates. Many people are fascinated with gorillas due to the fact that they have so many characteristics of humans.
There are two species of elephants remaining the African and the Asian. They range in color from light to dark gray, with the most distinct features being their huge ears and tusks.
The tall and lanky body of it covered in spots is very unusual and an animal that most people enjoy seeing.
Lions are large felines that are traditionally depicted as the "king of the jungle".
California Zoo. This zoo is full of cool animals. You should come and check it out.
